title: Railworks TS2014 AP37 ECML London to Peterborough Scenario Pack
description:
Armstrong Powerhouse presents a scenario pack for the ECML London to Peterborough route based in the present day (2011-2013). From diverted Freightliner services, to class 325 mail drags, to everyday freight, these eight scenarios are sure to show you a whole new side to this excellent route.

In these scenarios, we've strived for realism in all areas. For example, each scenario represents actual workings using the relevant timetable of the year to create an as realistic experience as possible. As well as this, prototypical formations are used where possible with all services having their time of leaving, origin and destination as their name so you can see which train is which!

RS.com ECML London to Peterborough 

Armstrong Powerhouse BAA/BZA Wagon Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse Class 90/Mk3 DVT Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse Class 321 Electric Multiple Unit Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse JXA/POA Wagon Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse Mk2E Coach Pack OR Digital Traction Mk2s - Discontinued

RS.com Class 67

RS.com Class 86 

RS.com Class 325 

RS.com European Community Asset Pack

RS.com EWS Class 66 V2.0 

RS.com Freightliner Class 66 V2.0 

RS.com Settle to Carlisle 

eNJOY AND SEED PEOPLE!!!
